verses.text_uthmani: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَمَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':44'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ‌ۖ لَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1397'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':10443'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَمْدُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':81'>َىْءٍ ق</tajweed>َد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yusabbiḥu lillāhi mā fis-samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ(i), lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu wa huwa 'alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
verses.translation: Все в небесах и на земле Аллаху воздает хвалу и славу! Ему принадлежит господство (над мирами), Ему - хвала, и мощь Его - над всем

verses.text_uthmani: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِنكُمْ كَافِرٌ وَمِنكُم مُّؤْمِنٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':153'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى خَلَقَكُمْ فَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12615'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ كَافِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13630'>رٌ و</tajweed>َمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2325'>نك</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13631'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّؤْمِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13632'>نٌ‌ۚ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Huwal-lażī khalaqakum fa minkum kāfiruw wa minkum mu'min(un), wallāhu bimā ta'malūna baṣīr(un).
verses.translation: Он - Тот, Кто создал вас. Средь вас есть те, которые не веруют (в Него), Но есть и верные (Аллаху); Ведь видит Он все то, что делаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَلَقَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3913'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1474'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمْ فَأَحْسَنَ صُوَرَكُمْ‌ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3461'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Khalaqas-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqqi wa ṣawwarakum fa'aḥsana ṣuwarakum, wa ilaihil-maṣīr(u).
verses.translation: Он небеса и землю в должном виде сотворил, Дал форму вам и виды ей прекрасные построил, К Нему лежит и ваше возвращенье

verses.text_uthmani: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':609'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':177'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلِي<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':2196'>مُۢ ب</tajweed>ِذَاتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2197'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صُّد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ya'lamu mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa ya'lamu mā tusirrūna wa mā tu'linūn(a), wallāhu 'alīmum biżātiṣ-ṣudūr(i).
verses.translation: Он знает все, что в небесах и на земле, И знает, что у вас сокрыто или явно. Поистине, Ему известно все, Что вы в сердцах своих храните

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ فَذَاقُوا۟ وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَبَؤُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7058'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ فَذَاقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَبَالَ أَمْرِهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul-lażīna kafarū min qabl(u), fa żāqū wabāla amrihim wa lahum 'ażābun alīm(un).
verses.translation: Неужто не пришел к вам сказ о тех, Которые отвергли веру в прошлом? Они вкусили зло своих деяний (на земле), Теперь их ждет жестокая расплата (и на небе)

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرٌ يَهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُوا۟ وَتَوَلَّوا۟ ۚ وَّٱسْتَغْنَى ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ بِأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَت تَّأْتِيهِمْ رُسُلُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':4900'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':484'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيِّنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ فَقَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَبَشَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13633'>رٌ ي</tajweed>َهْدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَتَوَلَّو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۚ</tajweed> وَّ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13634'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْنَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13635'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Żālika bi'annahū kānat ta'tīhim rusuluhum bil-bayyināti fa qālū abasyaruy yahdūnanā, fa kafarū wa tawallau wastagnallāh(u), wallāhu ganiyyun ḥamīd(un).
verses.translation: Все потому, что с ясными знаменьями (от Нас) Посланники к ним Наши приходили, Но молвили они: "Ужель на верный путь Нас будут направлять простые люди, (как и мы)?" И потому, в неверие облекшись, отвернулись. В них же Аллаху не было нужды. Свободен Он от всяких нужд и преисполнен славы

verses.text_uthmani: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَن لَّن يُبْعَثُوا۟ ۚ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُبْعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: زَعَمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13636'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13637'>َن ي</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13638'>بْ</tajweed>عَثُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ‌ۚ</tajweed> قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13639'>بْ</tajweed>عَثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ لَتُنَبَّؤُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ بِمَا عَمِلْتُمْ‌ۚ وَذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':412'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يَس<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Za'amal-lażīna kafarū allay yub'aṡū, qul balā wa rabbī latub'aṡunna ṡumma latunabba'unna bimā 'amiltum, wa żālika 'alallāhi yasīr(un).
verses.translation: И утверждают те, кто не уверовал (в Аллаха), Что никогда воскрешены они не будут. Скажи: "Да, я клянусь моим Владыкой, Вы будете воскрешены!" Потом вам сообщат о всех деяньях ваших, И это не составит Господу труда

verses.text_uthmani: فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلْنَا ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَـَٔـامِنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13640'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُورِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13641'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':515'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَا‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa āminū billāhi wa rasūlihī wan-nūril-lażī anzalnā, wallāhu bimā ta'malūna khabīr(un).
verses.translation: А потому уверуйте в Аллаха и посланника Его И в Свет, что Мы вам ниспослали, - Аллах ведь сведущ в том, что делаете вы

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَجْمَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْجَمْعِ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلتَّغَابُنِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعْمَلْ صَـٰلِحًا يُكَفِّرْ عَنْهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12425'>جْ</tajweed>مَعُكُمْ لِيَوْمِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13642'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَمْعِ‌ۖ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ يَوْمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13643'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>تَّغَابُنِ‌ۗ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yajma'ukum liyaumil-jam'i żālika yaumut-tagābun(i), wa may yu'mim billāhi wa ya'mal ṣāliḥay yukaffir 'anhu sayyi'ātihī wa yudkhilhu jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā(n), żālikal-fauzul-'aẓīm(u).
verses.translation: В тот День, Когда Он соберет вас всех Для Дня Великого Собранья, - То будет День взаимных поражений и наград, И с тех, которые уверовали (в Бога) и добрые дела творили, Он снимет все грехи И их введет в Сады, реками омовенны, И вечно пребывать им там, - Такою будет высшая награда

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَكَذَّبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':201'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارِ خَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۖ وَبِئْسَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':665'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>رُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nāri khālidīna fīhā, wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
verses.translation: Но тем, кто не уверовал (в Аллаха) И ложью объявил знамения Его, Быть обитателями О'гня И в нем, поистине, навечно пребывать. И будет мерзким это место упокоя

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُۥ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَصَابَ م<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12140'>ِن م</tajweed>ُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':509'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13644'>َن ي</tajweed>ُؤْم<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':12652'>ِنۢ ب</tajweed>ِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':32'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ يَهْدِ قَلْبَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā aṣāba mim muṣībatin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa may yu'mim billāhi yahdi qalbah(ū), wallāhu bikulli syai'in 'alīm(un).
verses.translation: И ни одна беда (вас) не постигнет Иначе, как с соизволения Аллаха; И сердце каждого, кто верует в Него, Направит Он на верный путь, - Аллах о всякой вещи знающ

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَطِيعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2238'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ وَأَطِيعُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2865'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّسُولَ‌ۚ فَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3779'>ن ت</tajweed>َوَلَّيْتُمْ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3780'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>غُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3781'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa aṭī'ullāha wa aṭī'ur-rasūl(a), fa'in tawallaitum fa innamā 'alā rasūlinal-balāgul-mubīn(u).
verses.translation: Так повинуйтесь же Аллаху и слушайте посланника Его! А если отвернетесь - что ж! Ведь на него возложено лишь ясно и открыто (Посланье Наше) передать

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱللَّهُ ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ وَعَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2207'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2208'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allāhu lā ilāha illā huw(a), wa 'alallāhi falyatawakkalil-mu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: Аллах! Нет божества, кроме Него, И лишь Ему все верные должны вверяться

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ مِنْ أَزْوَٰجِكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدِكُمْ عَدُوًّا لَّكُمْ فَٱحْذَرُوهُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَعْفُوا۟ وَتَصْفَحُوا۟ وَتَغْفِرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':541'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ مِنْ أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>جِكُمْ وَأَوْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِكُمْ عَدُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13647'>ًّا ل</tajweed>َّكُمْ فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13648'>ٱ</tajweed>حْذَرُوهُمْ‌ۚ وَإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13649'>ن ت</tajweed>َعْفُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَتَصْفَحُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَتَغْفِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':513'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ غَفُو<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':890'>رٌ ر</tajweed>َّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū inna min azwājikum wa aulādikum 'aduwwal lakum faḥżarūhum, wa in ta'fū wa taṣfaḥū wa tagfirū fa innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
verses.translation: О вы, кто верует! Поистине, средь ваших жен и средь детей Вы недругов найдете. Вы будьте с ними осторожны, Но если вы их извините, Не замечая (их уловки), Простите им (проступки их), - Так ведь Аллах, поистине, прощающ, милосерд

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لُكُمْ وَأَوْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دُكُمْ فِتْنَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13650'>ةٌ‌ۚ و</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':719'>ند</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2423'>جْ</tajweed>رٌ عَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innamā amwālukum wa aulādukum fitnah(tun), wallāhu 'indahū ajrun 'aẓīm(un).
verses.translation: Все ваше достояние и дети - Лишь испытание для вас. А у Аллаха - величайшая награда

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَٱسْمَعُوا۟ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفْسِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ

verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fattaqullāha mastaṭa'tum wasma'ū wa aṭī'ū wa anfiqū khairal li'anfusikum, wa may yūqa syuḥḥa nafsihī fa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
verses.translation: А потому страшитесь Его гнева, Послушны будьте и расходуйте на подать. И кто себя от скупости души освободит, - Тому (сопутствовать) удача будет и успех

verses.text_uthmani: إِن تُقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَـٰعِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَلِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13653'>ن ت</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13654'>قْ</tajweed>رِضُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13655'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13656'>نًا ي</tajweed>ُضَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>عِفْهُ لَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ‌ۚ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':72'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: In tuqriḍullāha qarḍan ḥasanay yuḍā'ifhu lakum wa yagfir lakum, wallāhu syakūrun ḥalīm(un).
verses.translation: И если вы дадите щедрый займ Аллаху, Воздаст Он вам вдвойне и ниспошлет прощенье, - Аллах ведь безгранично благодарен, Воздержан (в наказании Своем)

verses.translation: Тот, Кто знает, что сокрыто и что явно, И преисполнен мудрости и мощи
